name: SDBALL
description:
SDBALL is a game of dodge ball. You can have lots of fun with its funny graphics.

Feature:
1.Design for easy control and exciting gameplay.
2.Cute and funny graphics.
3.Every role in game has "super ball throwing", and your enemy will have bitter but funny reactions while being hitted by the ball.
4.Game Center multiplayer mode.
You could invite your friends or auto-match by Game
Center to play with other players on line ( tap "Play NOW"
button in Game Center menu ). When you are connected
with other player, if you are 1P, please select "VERSUS PLAY
(2 PLAYERS)" or "BEAN BALL(1-2 PLAYERS)" mode in game
menu to fight with 2P. Let's play ball on line!!
